languages.text: "То есть ты осознаешь, что угрожал Вольному Торговцу. И нисколько не беспокоишься?"

traits.locale_text: "То есть ты осознаешь, что угражал Вольному Торговцу. И нисколько не беспокоишься?"

languages.text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"
languages.original_text: "То есть ты осознаешь, что угрожал Вольному Торговцу. И нисколько не беспокоишься?"

traits.locale_text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"

"So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"

languages.text: “也就是说，你承认你之前在威胁行商浪人，而且你对此丝毫不以为意？”
languages.original_text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你承认你之前在威胁行商浪人，而且你对此丝毫不以为意？”

languages.text: «Entonces, ¿admite haber amenazado a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente y no tiene nada de miedo?».
languages.original_text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, ¿admite haber amenazado a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente y no tiene nada de miedo?».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者を脅迫していたと認めたな。だが、微塵も恐怖を感じていないだと？」
languages.original_text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者を脅迫していたと認めたな。だが、微塵も恐怖を感じていないだと？」

languages.text: « Vous admettez que vous menacez {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et vous n'êtes même pas effrayé ? »
languages.original_text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous admettez que vous menacez {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et vous n'êtes même pas effrayé ? »

languages.text: "Ihr gebt also zu, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} bedroht zu haben, und das beängstigt Euch überhaupt nicht?"
languages.original_text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr gebt also zu, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} bedroht zu haben, und das beängstigt Euch überhaupt nicht?"

languages.text: "Ne bu rahatlık? Koca Hür Tacir'i tehdit etmekten korkmuyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "So you admit you were threatening a Rogue Trader, and yet you're not the least bit afraid?"
